title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: The close button moves down when the view is resized smaller.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the size of the view. It should be located to the far right corner.
SR:
1. Open the view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Verify that the close button moves down instead of staying on the same line as the label.
